text: it took my mom a while to grow more

live in denial or just like they just

exist we should be a fervent believer to

started asking questions the whole

all the problems I didn't know of the

so when I told my family that I'm not a
Muslim anymore
I was faced with extreme anger I was
faced with threat when I was a child my
mum handed me a little book on bears and
as a very introduction there were three

why was just drawing a cartoon with

they taught us that when people drink

that's how I used to see those people
when I was a Muslim
it made me lose my trust in my community

phobia this area of the world has seen

it takes a lot of courage both moral and
